casebody.data:
No. 588. Henry Clay Pierce, Petitioner, v. Edmund P. Creecy, Chief of Police, etc. February 3, 1908. Mr. Joseph H. Choate and Mr. Joseph H. Choate, Jr., for petitioner. Mr. Shepard Barclay and Mr.- Thomas T. Fauntleroy for respondent.

Petition for'a writ of certiorari to the United. States-Circuit Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
